記錯歌詞 自膠
激光中

再黎

Why would you stay with a bastard like me?
Halfway through my life, I am still a failure
But your heart is never dead, suffer with me joyfully
Even I am bad, I cannot bear to do anything bad.
The world war has brought the universe to darkness, can you feel?

replies.msg: 無賴

Lets forget about right or wrong,
lets forget about the past
The tough days we have been through are somehow full of fun
Dont believe there is a chance of despair,
dont even feel frustrated
Competing in my dreams, striving in my days

Running in the wind and rain, being unruly from soberness to drunkenness,
as if all the stories have already happened in the unsettling time
The wind is over, whom should my heart return to?
Let the tears wash away the frustration at night

replies.msg: 洋蔥

From this minute start to count the spring wind and autumn rain , limit myself to forget you slowly by half a year. Settle the bill, calmly lower your temperature toward you. One day one point, more sad than hundred nights. May be enough for me to send myself back and forth the hell and then back to the earth at last. Break up in spring, and you will get use to it in autumn, the hardship will become less painful.
